column4: if there aren't any modelines in xorg.conf, can they even be used if added?
my understanding is modelines (and other config) will be used if added to the xorg.conf file. The challenge is to get the syntax & values correct when adding lines...
dunno what kind of computers you're used to, but the ones I use, you can't just guess at the config. You kind of have to know what you're doing...
sorry, you've exceeded my expertise on the subject. If you have an old mode line from a previous x config, that's what I'd try...
